title: Han Keong
author: Han Keong
content: AFF championship, Malaysia won against Singapore. And managed to enter the semi final. Now they are up against Thailand.

comments.author: Lily Lai
comments.body: Happy that Malaysia got into Semi finals.

comments.author: Kai Xuan
comments.body: Lets hope they can win until Finals.

comments.author: Keikei Tan
comments.body: Yes. It's better to win than lose. Plus I got bet money on them thru bk8.

comments.author: Han Keong
comments.body: Praying to god for themÂ  to win.

comments.body: Do they use bitcoin for it in BK8?

comments.author: Kai Xuan
comments.body: They do have crypto currency as payment. and if you join as new user, you will get the beginner bonuses.
